text:
Our educators — the custodians who help shape America and our children’s future — deserve to be recognized for their contributions and hard work. That is why I am voting #YesOnG.

Watch LIVE as I rally with teachers and students in San Francisco! #CA12👇

https://www.facebook.com/pelosiforcongress/videos/2099591526953266/

Violence against trans women of color is at record highs, and politicians are trying to exclude transgender Americans from public services, civil rights protections, and military service. Today, the leadership of trans women like Andrea Jenkins is vital for our democracy. #Pride http://pbs.twimg.com/media/DeyTDWyU8AERVPN.jpg
We’ve lost far too many of our classmates, friends, family members and children to gun violence. Another moment of silence is not enough.

RT @shawneebadger Thank you so much for coming to speak to Disneyland cast members @BernieSanders @SenSanders! When guests forget we are real human beings, it’s somewhat expected; but, when our employer forgets we are real human beings..it is hurtful. Especially when we work so hard to make magic. https://twitter.com/shawneebadger/status/1002994397229637632 QT @shawneebadger In addition to being a 2016 @BernieSanders delegate, I have been a castmember at Disneyland since 2014, making magic but continually struggling. I got to meet Bernie backstage & told him my experiences. Thank you for coming to Anaheim & speaking truth to power. #StopDisneyPoverty http://pbs.twimg.com/media/DetaDlOUcAAtsWS.jpg http://pbs.twimg.com/media/DetaDlNUYAA8_yz.jpg

They prepare our students for the real world. They give up so much. 

That is why our teachers in San Francisco and across the country deserve fair, living wages. On June 5th, vote #YesOnG! #CA12 #RedForEd http://pbs.twimg.com/media/DeyhLQ_VMAA5qHH.jpg http://pbs.twimg.com/media/DeyhLQ_VMAETec2.jpg http://pbs.twimg.com/media/DeyhLOmUYAAqoot.jpg http://pbs.twimg.com/media/DeyhJvdUEAAekl5.jpg

I’m happy to see the courts step in to block this unconstitutional abortion law in Iowa. Republicans in Washington and across the country are doing everything they can to restrict access to safe and legal abortion. It’s up to all of us to stop them. https://www.npr.org/sections/thetwo-way/2018/06/01/616136014/court-puts-temporary-stop-on-iowas-heartbeat-abortion-law

La respuesta del gobierno federal en Puerto Rico después del huracán María ha sido pésima. Hablé con @TelemundoNI sobre un nuevo proyecto de ley que tengo con el @SenMarkey para finalmente ayudar a los sobrevivientes que han venido a Massachusetts a encontrar nuevos hogares. http://pbs.twimg.com/media/DezFrAAX0AASu7Z.jpg https://video.twimg.com/amplify_video/1003392469457764352/vid/320x180/uXFvnuNlVLY-8SCh.mp4?tag=2

I want to hear the moral defense of a company like Disney that makes $9 billion in profits, $400 million for their CEO and has a 30-year worker going hungry. http://thehill.com/homenews/senate/390430-bernie-sanders-disney-needs-moral-defense-for-having-hungry-workers-while

California Democrats, are you ready to vote in Tuesday’s primary? It's critical you turn out and vote to make sure Democrats are on the ballot in November. Find out where you’ll be voting on Tuesday here: http://secure.kamalaharris.org/ca-votes http://pbs.twimg.com/media/DezNcQIW0AAwPfB.jpg

The gap between the rich and the poor continues to grow. Tackling income inequality is one of the most pressing issues of our time. It must be addressed through living wages, equal pay for equal work, and access to quality, affordable education.

Kicking off #pridemonth celebrating #LGBTQ community in Asbury Park, NJ #JerseyPride #Equality http://pbs.twimg.com/media/DezcBTaW0AEqgn6.jpg http://pbs.twimg.com/media/DezcBTBXUAAkrGP.jpg http://pbs.twimg.com/media/DezcBTJXkAAQyVW.jpg http://pbs.twimg.com/media/DezcBSqX0AA__Hu.jpg

As they brace for another hurricane season, we still don’t know why our government failed Puerto Rico so drastically after Hurricane Maria. We need to invest top-level resources to investigate why it happened and how we can stop it from happening again. https://www.cnn.com/2018/06/01/us/puerto-rico-hurricane-readiness/index.html
